component.name: Separator
component.description: Thin visual divider line for separating content sections.

useCases: Visually dividing sections within a card or panel
Separating groups of menu items in a dropdown
Vertical divider between inline elements in a toolbar

commonPatterns.name: card-section-divider
commonPatterns.description: Dividing content sections within a card

antiPatterns.reason: Separator is a visual line, not a spacer
antiPatterns.alternative: Use margin or padding utilities for spacing without a visible line

antiPatterns.scenario: Using Separator as a border replacement
antiPatterns.reason: Components like Card already have borders; adding separators creates visual noise
antiPatterns.alternative: Use the component's built-in border styling

parentConstraints: Horizontal: takes full width of parent. Vertical: set an explicit height via className

responsive.mobile: Stretches to container width (horizontal) or height (vertical)

accessibility.screenReader: Announced as separator when decorative=false; hidden when decorative=true (default)

rules: Defaults to decorative=true, which hides it from screen readers
Set decorative=false when the separator conveys meaningful content boundaries
Horizontal separators are full-width by default (1px height)
Vertical separators are full-height by default (1px width) — set an explicit height class
Uses bg-border color token for consistent theming

aiHints.context: Use Separator to visually divide content sections with a thin line. Defaults to horizontal orientation and decorative mode. Built on the Radix Separator primitive. For vertical use, set orientation="vertical" and provide an explicit height.
